entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -22.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 1:36 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -22.3°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -25.3°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:27 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 1:27 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 1:27 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
